forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco presents itself as a sunlit canvas where the golden hues of light dance across the city’s iconic bridges and rooftops. A gentle whisper of a west-southwest breeze carries with it the crispness of the ocean, invigorating yet soft—a perfect companion to the day's unfolding splendor. As the sun reaches its zenith, temperatures hover around a comfortable 66 degrees, gradually retreating to a soothing 64 in the late afternoon. While the skies seem generous with clarity, the westerly wind gusts, brisk and spirited, infuse a sense of movement found in the heart of this vibrant metropolis.

As evening descends, the horizon will hold a promise of partly clouded skies, enveloping the city in a serene embrace with lows around 56 degrees. Those venturing out after sundown would do well to layer up—a light jacket would suffice against the cool breath of the night air. The conditions beckon with the call of quiet enjoyment; perhaps a leisurely stroll through the streets of North Beach, a chance to savor artisanal coffee while witnessing the bay transform under the glow of urban lights. Alternatively, finding oneself at an outdoor patio where the evening breeze mingles with warmth will serve as a soothing retreat, allowing for moments of gentle conversation as the day gracefully yields to the night.
